edu.luc.cs.trull.swing
Class SwingScheduler

java.lang.Object
  edu.luc.cs.trull.swing.FastSwingScheduler
      edu.luc.cs.trull.swing.SwingScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scheduler
public class SwingScheduler
extends FastSwingScheduler

An implementation of the Scheduler interface based on the Java Swing event dispatch thread. It supports the await method. This Scheduler implementation guarantees that the application satisfies the Swing single-thread rule without explicit scheduling of tasks in the Swing event dispatch thread.

See Also:
Scheduler

          A wrapper around a runnable that decrements the queue length when the runnable has finished.
